summary.para: A vertex-shader interface manages an executable program (a vertex shader) that controls the vertex-shader stage.

remarks.para: The vertex-shader interface has no methods; use HLSL to implement your shader functionality. All shaders are implemented from a common set of features referred to as the common-shader core..

This interface is defined in D3D11.h.
